title: Hedge Funds Boost Bullish Gold Wagers to 16-Week High
description: Money managers increased their bullish wagers on gold to the highest since October as anxieties over Greenland prompted investors to rotate into hard assets away from currencies and sovereign bonds.
content: Money managers increased their bullish wagers on gold to the highest since October as anxieties over Greenland prompted investors to rotate into hard assets away from currencies and sovereign bonds.
